scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a letter from Ambrose Bierce, N. Y. American Office, Washington, D. C., to "My dear Reagles." He writes about a day they spent together in Washington, a lost drawing, and his desire to be in California.
